Hi,

I'm a new user of Heritrix but I can't crawl with it.
When I launch it on the website www.memodata.com (or other), I got the
following result in the reports :

Job name:   	 patrick
Status:  	Finished
Time:  	0 sec.
	    	
Processed docs/sec:  	0.0
Processed KB/sec:  	0.0
Total data written:  	0 B

	URIs 	
Pending: 	0 	 ? 	
Discovered: 	2 	 ?
  Queued: 	0 	 ?
  In progress: 	0 	 ?
	  Total 	  Successfully 	  Failed 	  Disregarded
  Finished: 	31 	0 	31 	0

Status code 	Documents
 
File type 	Documents 	Data

Hosts  	Documents  	Data 


And in the log file I got :

20040910135412061    -7          - dns:www.memodata.com P
http://www.memodata.com/index no-type #000 - - -
20040910135412061    -7          - dns:www.memodata.com P
http://www.memodata.com/index no-type #000 - - -
...

On the console I have the following error :
java.util.logging.ErrorManager: 5
java.lang.NullPointerException
at
org.archive.crawler.io.RuntimeErrorFormatter.format(RuntimeErrorFormatter.java:53)
....

I use the Jre 1.4.2_04 on Windows XP
Has anybody an idea ?
thanks

Patrick
